body:
Can someone give me my retired rank on TS back... I was told that it was being fixed, but its like a 1 minute thing to fix. Also, could I have a retired lounge xP.
Mods, dont bitch at me (not using it as a curse word) for making this topic, this is the correct category for this seeing that most people don't respond to Skype anymore. Please just message Fluenza or Jake the link.
Tank you,
Max
